Author: _potato_cakes_
Text: Well you are underweight, correct? So maybe work towards getting to a healthy weight in time for the show!

Author: EzraCelestine
Text: Is there any way that they can add some pieces to your costume? I remember at our production of it the uhhh... were they called nymphs? had on like, lil sections of like grass and moss and such on top of their leotards that covered up about 40% of the outfit. Not a full solution but better than nothing
